name: 31-in-1 Mighty Mix
summary:
An unlicensed collection by developer Sachen, consisting of these games:
THUNDER BLASTER MAN
JURASSIC BOY 2
STREET RIDER
BOMB DISPOSER
DAN LASER
VEX BLOCK
EXPLOSIVE BRICK 99
SMALL GORILLA (untagged)
TRAP & TURN
PILE WONDER
ARCTIC ZONE
ZOO BLOCK
MAGIC TOWER
VIRUS ATTACK
ELECTRON WORLD
TROUBLE ZONE
DICE SQUARE
RAILWAY
WORM VISITOR
2ND SPACE
BLACK FOREST TALE
A-FORCE
SKY ACE
WAR FLEA
CRAZY BURGER (untagged)
DEEP (untagged)
ZIP BALL
PUPPET KNIGHT
CAPTAIN KNICK-KNACK ANT SOLDIER
DUCK ADVENTURES
